subject: pedal de embrague no m funciona correctamente
description_text: hola el pedal de embrague para llegar al tope hay como que apretarlo 2 veces, sabes que podría ser. gracias

conversations.body_text: Hi Cosme Gonzalez Espino,  Please check which version of the Pro pedals you have. If it’s version 1.7.1, it supports manual updates and works with Simsonn Manager 2.1.2. If it’s version 1.7.0, the firmware cannot be updated.

Hi Cosme Gonzalez Espino,   Please make sure the clutch is properly installed and securely fixed, and that the preload screws are tightened correctly. Then click Offset to reset the signal and recalibrate the pedals. If the issue still persists, please send me photos of the clutch side and the two springs, and I’ll check them for you.
ID 号为 5519, 5520 和 5527 的工单已合并到此工单。
